name: InsertResponse
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
InsertResponse
description:
InsertResponse

Represents the response from BigQuery when data is inserted into a table for near-immediate querying, without the need to complete a load operation before the data can appear in query results. See Dataset#insert and Table#insert.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/bigquery"

bigquery = Google::Cloud::Bigquery.new
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"

rows = [
  { "first_name" => "Alice", "age" => 21 },
  { "first_name" => "Bob", "age" => 22 }
]

insert_response = dataset.insert "my_table", rows

methods.name: success?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
InsertResponse#success?
methods.description: Checks if the error count is zero, meaning that all of the rows were inserted. Use #insert_errors to access the errors.

returns.description: true when the error count is zero, false otherwise.

methods.name: insert_count
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
InsertResponse#insert_count
methods.description: The count of rows in the response, minus the count of errors for rows that were not inserted.

methods.name: error_count
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
InsertResponse#error_count
methods.description: The count of errors for rows that were not inserted.

methods.name: insert_errors
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
InsertResponse#insert_errors
methods.description: The error objects for rows that were not inserted.

returns.description:
An array of hash objects containing the row
data.

methods.name: insert_error_for
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
InsertResponse#insert_error_for
methods.description: Returns the error object for a row that was not inserted.

params.name: row
params.description: A hash containing the data for a row.

returns.description: An error object, or nil if no error is found in the response for the row.

methods.name: errors_for
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
InsertResponse#errors_for
methods.description: Returns the error hashes for a row that was not inserted. Each error hash contains the following keys: reason, location, debugInfo, and message.

params.name: row
params.description: A hash containing the data for a row.

returns.description: An array of error hashes, or nil if no errors are found in the response for the row.

methods.name: index_for
title: Google
Cloud
Bigquery
InsertResponse#index_for
methods.description: Returns the index for a row that was not inserted.

params.name: row
params.description: A hash containing the data for a row.

returns.description: An error object, or nil if no error is found in the response for the row.
